problem.script: from __future__ import division from loncapa import * a= "F-m*g*sin(alpha)"
problem.p: Part b. Let's assume that the applied force is such that F > \(mg\sin\alpha\). What is the magnitude of the force of static friction? If needed, to enter \(\mu_s\), \(\mu_k\), \(\sin\alpha\), \(\cos\alpha\) or \(\tan\alpha\) write mus, muk, sin(alpha), cos(alpha) or tan(alpha), respectively.
